TextView.android:text: Who has the best chili in Cincinnati? Skyline Chili, of course. Now, we may be a bit biased, but City Beat readers have named Skyline Cincinnati’s Best Chili 25 years in row. That’s good enough for us. Where is the nearest Skyline Chili? Use our locations page to find a Skyline close to home, work or wherever you are right now. What should I order at Skyline? Our two most popular menu items are our 3-Way Chili and Cheese Coneys. One taste and you’ll know why they have been our best sellers since 1949. Feeling a bit more adventurous? Try a 4-Way with beans or onions, or a 5-way with beans AND onions. Is Skyline Chili open now? Most Skyline restaurants are open seven days a week. Different locations have different hours. You can find details for each restaurant on our locations page. What states have Skyline Chili? You’ll find our unique chili parlors in Ohio, Kentucky, Indiana, and Florida. What are the ingredients in Skyline Chili? Skyline Chili is made from a secret family recipe passed down through generations. We can’t tell you the specifics, but we’re sure you’ll like it. What is Cincinnati Style Chili? The term is used to describe a unique type of chili that originated in the Cincinnati area. Based on Greek family recipes, it is different from Southwestern or Texas-style chili. Is Skyline hiring? We are always looking for qualified workers who share our passion for serving amazing 3-Ways and Cheese Coneys. Can I own a Skyline franchise? Yes, you can own your own Skyline Chili restaurant. We love to expand our franchise family. Please visit our franchising page to learn more.
